amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to add Cabinet members to the list of individuals prohibited from benefiting from an agreement with the U.S. Government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
